statements: SELECT * FROM Publication;
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM Publication WHERE publication_type='Magazine';
SELECT publication_id, publication_name, publication_editor FROM Publication WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Publication GROUP BY publication_type;
SELECT publication_name AS name, publication_editor AS editor FROM Publication ORDER BY publication_editor DESC;
SELECT * FROM Publication ORDER BY publication_name ASC
SELECT publication_name, publication_date FROM Publication WHERE publication_type = 'Magazine' AND publication_editor = 'John Doe'
SELECT publication_name, publication_type, publication_date FROM Publication WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND publication_type != 'Newspaper'
SELECT publication_name, publication_editor FROM Publication WHERE publication_type = 'Journal' ORDER BY publication_editor ASC
SELECT * FROM Publication WHERE publication_type = 'Book' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT id, title, author FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, content FROM articles ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, content FROM articles WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT articles.title, images.image_url FROM articles INNER JOIN images ON articles.id = images.article_id;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE caption IS NOT NULL AND credit IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT image_url FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, elements FROM layout_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE caption LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 5;
SELECT article_id, author, content FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith' AND content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT template_name, elements FROM layout_templates ORDER BY template_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE caption IS NOT NULL ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, bio FROM authors WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM layout_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC, article_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author_id FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1 OR author_id = 2;
SELECT article_id, title, author_name FROM articles INNER JOIN authors ON articles.author_id = authors.author_id WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT articles.title, images.image_url, images.caption FROM articles INNER JOIN images ON articles.article_id = images.article_id WHERE images.image_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT author_name, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM authors INNER JOIN articles ON authors.author_id = articles.author_id GROUP BY author_name HAVING article_count > 2 ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT article_id, title, published_date FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_url, caption FROM images WHERE category = 'nature';
SELECT template_id, template_name, description FROM layout_templates ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, category FROM articles JOIN images ON articles.article_id = images.image_id;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE bio LIKE '%research%';
SELECT title, description FROM publications WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
